documentation.text:
@title kyberFeeHandler
 * @dev EmergencyFeeHandler works when dao has problem
     rebateBps and rewardBps is only set when initialization
     user can claim platformfee, rebate and reward will be distributed by admin

attributes.text:
@dev set new kyberNetwork address by daoOperator
 @param _kyberNetwork new kyberNetwork contract

devdoc.details: EmergencyFeeHandler works when dao has problem     rebateBps and rewardBps is only set when initialization     user can claim platformfee, rebate and reward will be distributed by admin

claimAdmin().details: Allows the pendingAdmin address to finalize the change admin process.

claimPlatformFee(address).details: claim accumulated fee per platform wallet. Called by any address

params.platformWallet: the wallet to claim fee for. Total accumulated fee sent to this wallet.

handleFees(address,address[],uint256[],a.details: handleFees function is called per trade on KyberNetwork. unless the trade is not involving any fees.

params.networkFee: Fee amount (in wei) to be allocated for BRR
params.platformFee: Fee amount in wei the platfrom wallet is entitled to.
params.platformWallet: Wallet address that will receive the platfrom fee.
params.rebateBpsPerWallet: percentage of rebate for each wallet, out of total rebate.
params.rebateWallets: a list of rebate wallets that will get rebate for this trade.

setNetworkContract(address).details: set new kyberNetwork address by daoOperator

transferAdmin(address).details: Allows the current admin to set the pendingAdmin address

params.newAdmin: The address to transfer ownership to

transferAdminQuickly(address).details: Allows the current admin to set the admin in one tx. Useful initial deployment.

params.newAdmin: The address to transfer ownership to.
